General.Name: Lotte Rental Co Ltd
General.Description: LOTTE rental co.,ltd. provides car and equipment rental services in South Korea. It also provides household goods, automobiles, and office equipment rental services, as well as vehicle maintenance and auto auction services. The company was formerly known as KT Rental Co., Ltd. and changed its name to LOTTE rental co.,ltd. on June 24, 2015. LOTTE rental co.,ltd. was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
